section.title: incidents creating new categories for Incident Category
section.para: To create a new Incident Category, select the NEW button. The following screen will appear:
When creating a new Incident Category, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: Enter a name to define the Category (e.g., Customer Issue, Vendor Issue, etc.).
Specify the order in which the Category should appear when using the drop-down list on the Incident screen.
Enter a brief description of the Incident Category.

section.para: To the far right of the screen, the following buttons are available:

listitem.para: Closes the screen without creating an Incident Category, returning you to the previous screen.
Creates the Incident Category and adds it to the master list of Incident Categories.
